virtualConnect.title: VIRTUAL CONNECT
virtualConnect.visualContents:
This VIRNECT's meet-up event is to prioritize customers' opinions.
We are committed to standing at our customers' side and providing better services.
virtualConnect.headingContents:
Thank you for visiting the 1st Virtual Connect.
Those who could not attend this event held online/offline can watch the event via the recording below.

videos.title: Combination of Google Machine Learning and VIRNECT Remote
videos.speaker: Gyong-mi Park, Google AE

videos.title: Contactless business innovation, AR remote collaboration and application cases
videos.speaker: Jiuk Lee, VIRNECT Business Development Manager

videos.title: VIRNECT Make/View: Innovation of content creation, creation and application cases of non-coding AR content
videos.speaker: ​Su-hwan Kim, VIRNECT Product Design Team Leader

videos.title: Use of VIRNECT Make/View in Capstone Design Education
videos.speaker: ​Gi-jin Lee, VIRNECT Business Development Manager
